Type

The Mayor’s Office for Economic Opportunity helps the City use evidence and innovation to reduce poverty and increase equity.

<h1 class="h1">The Mayor’s Office for Economic Opportunity helps the City use evidence and innovation to reduce poverty and increase equity.</h1>

Heading 1

Use the <h1> tag for semantic hierarchy. Using the correct markup for text hierarchy is important for assistive technologies . The .h1 class can be used to style type tags as <h1> tags if is better for them to be visually styled that way.

The Mayor’s Office for Economic Opportunity helps the City use evidence and innovation to reduce poverty and increase equity.

<h2 class="h2">The Mayor’s Office for Economic Opportunity helps the City use evidence and innovation to reduce poverty and increase equity.</h2>

Heading 2

Use the <h2> tag for semantic hierarchy or the .h2 class for visual styling.

The Mayor’s Office for Economic Opportunity helps the City use evidence and innovation to reduce poverty and increase equity.

<h3 class="h3">The Mayor’s Office for Economic Opportunity helps the City use evidence and innovation to reduce poverty and increase equity.</h3>

Heading 3

Use the <h3> tag for semantic hierarchy or the .h3 class for visual styling.

The Mayor’s Office for Economic Opportunity helps the City use evidence and innovation to reduce poverty and increase equity.

<h4 class="h4">The Mayor’s Office for Economic Opportunity helps the City use evidence and innovation to reduce poverty and increase equity.</h4>

Heading 4

Use the <h4> tag for semantic hierarchy or the .h4 class for visual styling.

The Mayor’s Office for Economic Opportunity helps the City use evidence and innovation to reduce poverty and increase equity.
<h5 class="h5">The Mayor’s Office for Economic Opportunity helps the City use evidence and innovation to reduce poverty and increase equity.</h5>

Heading 5

Use the <h5> tag for semantic hierarchy or the .h5 class for visual styling.

The Mayor’s Office for Economic Opportunity helps the City use evidence and innovation to reduce poverty and increase equity.
<h6 class="h6">The Mayor’s Office for Economic Opportunity helps the City use evidence and innovation to reduce poverty and increase equity.</h6>

Heading 6

Use the <h6> tag for semantic hierarchy or the .h6 class for visual styling.

The Mayor’s Office for Economic Opportunity helps the City use evidence and innovation to reduce poverty and increase equity.
<small class="small">The Mayor’s Office for Economic Opportunity helps the City use evidence and innovation to reduce poverty and increase equity.</small>

Small

The <small> tag is used to define text that is smaller than the body font.

The Mayor’s Office for Economic Opportunity helps the City use evidence and innovation to reduce poverty and increase equity.
<blockquote class="blockquote">The Mayor’s Office for Economic Opportunity helps the City use evidence and innovation to reduce poverty and increase equity.</blockquote>

Blockquote

The <blockquote> tag is used to indicate the quotation of a large section of text from another source.

The Mayor’s Office for Economic Opportunity helps the City use evidence and innovation to reduce poverty and increase equity.

<h1 class="jumbo">The Mayor’s Office for Economic Opportunity helps the City use evidence and innovation to reduce poverty and increase equity.</h1>

Jumbo

The .jumbo class is the largest heading size reserved for emphasized headings.

Overview GitHub Repository NYC Opportunity Tailwind CSS NYC Digital Blueprint

NYC Opportunity is the New York City Mayor's Office for Economic Opportunity . We are committed to sharing open source software that we use in our products. Feel free to ask questions and share feedback. Follow @nycopportunity on  Twitter ,  Facebook ,  Medium , and  Github .
